mapper.select: SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents FROM notice
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents FROM notice where id = #{noticeId}
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents FROM notice order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, regdate, publisher, contents) VALUES (#{title}, now(), #{publisher}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
